attributes.title: give it a 1 star, smh
attributes.review: it’s terrible! i went to go look at the latest news and it turns out my pet rock put a tv on my fridge and shawn mendes ate mcdonald’s right after that. you can tell me if you’re not lookin is a very bad game and i was the way i is a really bad day i is a great game to be fun and you get it bruh bruh. DO NOT GET IT. 1 STAR APP

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: The app is absolutely slow, and I had expected it to be at least use-able, considering it is an app that goes towards Trump being president if the U.S. I guess despite the importance, though, they didn’t care enough to fix any bugs and such

attributes.title: The app dedicated to the worst president in HISTORY
attributes.review: When downloading the app I forgot that trump is a racist so I deleted it! Also he leaked intel to Russia and condemned the killing of our US military. Trump is nothing less then a pinecone you kick on the street and when you miss it you don’t even bother to kick it up again. 🤡🤡🤡

attributes.title: This is terrifying
attributes.review: WHEN I OPENED THE APP IT SHOWED A CLOWN 🤡 ! My sister was SOOO TERRIFIED that she started crying . Now she wants to sleep with me tonight 😒! Thanks A lot CLOWN (trump)😤 and also instead of taking down tiktok how about think to fix your country instead of being pressed over a stupid app 🤦🏾‍♀️. It was SOOO much better when Obama was in office instead of a Cheeto blonde 🤦🏾‍♀️.

attributes.title: disgusted!!
attributes.review: i opened the app and couldn’t navigate it at all!! not only did i see a awful orange boy in every photo but he was doing awful things. i’m pretty sure this is some kind of of brand onlyfans? no one wants to see that from him ew. Would not recommend at all this is absurd

attributes.title: 👁👄👁no
attributes.review: Right when I opened the app I saw the big Cheeto man himself walk right into my door and then he started dancing with a dinosaur so I closed out of the app immediately then on their way out they took my refrigerator microwave and oven which I thought was RUDE and then they threw a stink bomb into my house so now it smells like The Cheetoman

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS🤮🤮⚠️
attributes.review: I opened the app, then my fridge ate my pet dragon. Then my microwave booked a flight to china. So i went to home depot on my pegasus and bought a new fridge AND microwave. Then my oven said he wanted to go on vacation. Then i had to buy a new oven as well so then that was a total of 30,000 dollars i spent. Then my cat grew wings and took a trip to italy.

attributes.title: Oh to see without my eyes🙈
attributes.review: I accidentally downloaded this app and was SHOCKED on how absolutely DISGUSTING it was. Seconds later my screen flashed to a ugly naked Cheeto causing me to immediately wash my eyes out with bleach. Ps the graphics were also HORRIBLE and I felt second hand embarrassment from whomever devolved it.. if I could rate it .1 star I would!!!!!!👿🤬😡

attributes.title: WORST experience i’ve ever had ❤️
attributes.review: idk abt y’all but when i downloaded this app i was just overcome by a wave of stupidity. this app really has effected my life to the point where i am in capable of making rational decision or thoughts. pls pray for me you guys, this app deserves less than a zero star rating in my opinion. 😔👎🤮

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This all is so horrid! 🙀 it’s an absolute disgrace!!! It’s so just bad, seriously!!!!!!! This app Asked for my phone number, 👁👄👁 MY PHONE NUMBER. Well I’ll have you know, big orange Cheeto that I am happily married, and my 40 year anniversary 🧍‍♀️🧍is next week 🕺 Soooooo, yeah I hate this app! This app should 🧚✨die✨🧚🏻‍♂️ thank you very much for listening. 😃
